heads.name: Ch. Aarthi
heads.bio: Leads overall digital content strategy, brand voice, and platform management for maximum reach.

heads.name: B. Arjun
heads.bio: Focuses on community engagement, content scheduling, and managing analytics for performance optimization.

coordinators.name: Bharath Chandra
coordinators.bio: Plans the content calendar and leads the effort to align digital campaigns with club events.

coordinators.name: Sumanth
coordinators.bio: Responsible for capturing high-quality photo and video assets at all club activities.

coordinators.name: Yashwanth
coordinators.bio: Tracks and reports social media metrics (reach, impressions) to inform future digital strategies.

coordinators.name: Ch. Vamshi
coordinators.bio: Assists the design team in creating dynamic and engaging visual templates for social posts.

coordinators.name: D. Vamsi
coordinators.bio: Crafts compelling post captions, event announcements, and blog summaries for the club's platforms.

members.name: Varsha
members.bio: Actively involved in community management and real-time event coverage.

members.name: Karthik
members.bio: Focuses on trend research and generating ideas for viral content campaigns.

members.name: Abhinav
members.bio: Assists with video editing and post-production for social media reels.

members.name: Sriya
members.bio: Responsible for asset organization and maintaining the club's digital resource library.

members.name: Triya
members.bio: Contributes to copywriting and proofreading all external communications.

roles.title: Content Strategy
responsibilities: Campaign Planning: Develop and manage the content calendar across all platforms.
Branding: Maintain a consistent visual and verbal identity for Plexus.
Trend Research: Identify and leverage current social media trends.
Platform Optimization: Adapt content strategies for Instagram, LinkedIn, and X.

roles.title: Visual Production
responsibilities: Photography/Videography: Capture high-quality media during all club events.
Editing: Post-production editing of photos and reels.
Live Coverage: Handle real-time updates and story posting during events.
Asset Management: Organize and archive all digital media.

roles.title: Engagement & Analytics
responsibilities: Community Management: Monitor comments, DMs, and drive online discussion.
Reporting: Track engagement metrics (reach, impressions, conversions).
Optimization: Provide data-driven insights to improve future posting times and content types.
Copywriting: Write compelling captions and calls-to-action.
